```{r}

#| label: fig-loading
#| fig-cap: Loadings of Variables on IRSD produced by ABS

# library packages
library(tidyverse)

# load data
SEIFA_Loading <- read_csv("data/IRSD_loading.csv") 

# graph 

SEIFA_Loading %>%
  pivot_longer(3:6,
               names_to = "Year",
               values_to = "Loading") %>%
  mutate(Variables = fct_reorder(Variables, Loading,
                                 .desc = TRUE, .na_rm = FALSE)) %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(x = Loading,
                 y = Variables,
                 fill = Year,
                 size = Year),
             alpha = 0.65,
             shape = 21,
             color = "black") +
  scale_size_manual(values = c("2006" = 3, 
                               "2011" = 4.5,
                               "2016" = 6,
                               "2021" = 7.5)) +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "YlOrRd") +
  labs(fill = "Census Year",
       size = "Census Year",
       shape = "ss",
       x = "Loadings") +
  scale_x_reverse(limits = c(0,-1)) +
  theme_bw()

```
